problem_text_cn: 如图,▱ABCD的周长为36,对角线AC、BD相交于点O,点E是CD的中点,BD=12,则△DOE的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the perimeter of ▱ABCD is N_0, the diagonal AC and BD intersect at point O, point E is the midpoint of CD, BD = N_1, then the perimeter of △DOE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵\sqsubsetABCD的周长为36,∴2(BC+CD)=36,则BC+CD=18∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,对角线AC,BD相交于点O,BD=12又∵点E是CD的中点,DE=\frac{1}{2}CD,∴OE是△BCD的中位线,∴OE=\frac{1}{2}BC,∴△DOE的周长=OD+OE+DE=\frac{1}{2}BD+\frac{1}{2}(BC+CD)=6+9=15,即△DOE的周长为15.故选A
raw_comment: 此题重点考察学生对于平行四边形的性质的理解,三角形的中位线,平行四边形的对角对边性质是解题的关键.
